title: Chameleon
description:
Brooke Anders, a young detective, has a big secret: she enjoys bondage sex, and killing people. When she mix both, she finds out she can't stop. Using her job to cover her tracks and controlling the murder cases the same way she controls her victims, she plans to keep her journey looking for the next ultimate pleasure. But even when she's smart at her own game, she knows it won't last forever.


_________________________

author: Reptileye
